## Source: ossf-package-analysis (ff38ec4bc16deffc06b83871ccc54e39dca722ba5b2862154060b08c10eb4042)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ls-onboarding-frontend' @ 100.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
